mapper.select: SELECT OI.OFFICER_ID AS officerId, OI.USER_ID AS userId, OI.OFFICE_USER_NAME AS officerUserName, OI.DISTRICT_DEP_CODE AS districtDepCode, DD.DISTRICT_DEP_NAME AS districtDepName, OI.OFFICER_CERT AS officerCert, OI.WORK_START_DATE AS workStartDate, OI.OFFICER_ACCOUNT_STAT AS officerAccountStat, OI.OFFICER_RECENT_LOGIN AS officerRecentLogin FROM OFFICER_INFO AS OI INNER JOIN DISTRICT_DEP AS DD ON OI.DISTRICT_DEP_CODE = DD.DISTRICT_DEP_CODE;
